name: three-man-league
description: Fantasy football pick 'em game with Google sign-in, leagues, and weekly picks

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:functions
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:functions
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:functions
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../functions && npm install
